channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: イスラエルとハマスの戦争で読者が増加する中、ユダヤ人左派に焦点を当てたデジタル・印刷雑誌「Jewish Currents」の編集者マリ・コーエンとのQ&A（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
Q&A with Mari Cohen, an editor at Jewish Currents, a digital and print magazine focused on the Jewish left, as readership rises during the Israel-Hamas war  —  “We're very conscious of trying to hold this large community of people who are really struggling.”

item.title: ユタ・ジャズが放送を担当するようになり、NBA、MLB、NHLはRSNの安定した収入源がなくてもチームが成功できるかどうかに注目している（Ira Boudway/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ira Boudway / Bloomberg:
As Utah Jazz takes charge of its broadcasts, the NBA, MLB, and NHL will be watching whether teams can thrive without a steady RSN revenue stream  —  With its regional sports network shuttered, the team has taken charge of its broadcasts.  The rest of the NBA—as well as baseball and hockey—is watching.

item.title: イーロン・マスクは、Xがリンクのプレビュー見出しを再び表示し始める予定だと語ったが、時期の詳細やカードの見え方の例は示さなかった（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Elon Musk says X plans to start showing preview headlines for links again, but did not offer details on a timeline or give an example of how the cards will look  —  Elon Musk said that X, formerly Twitter, will start showing headlines in preview cards with URLs on the platform again after removing titles last month.

item.title: イスラエルとハマスの戦争について、虚偽または誤解を招くような主張をしている大規模アカウントのXへの30件の投稿を分析したところ、24件以下の投稿で86ブランド等から200件の広告が見つかった（NewsGuard）。
item.description:
NewsGuard:
An analysis of 30 posts on X from large accounts with false or misleading claims on the Israel-Hamas war found 200 ads from 86 brands and others below 24 posts  —  NewsGuard identified ads for 86 major advertisers — including top brands, educational institutions, governments, and nonprofits …

item.title: 10月7日以来、イスラエルとハマスの戦争で少なくとも50人のジャーナリストが殺された。
item.description:
Chris Brown / CBC News:
Since October 7, at least 50 journalists have been killed in the Israel-Hamas war, with the vast majority from Gaza; Israel's military denies targeting them  —  Reporters covering the war claim they're being deliberately targeted  —  When a rocket fired by Israel's military flattened buildings …

item.title: カール・リンシュのSFテレビシリーズはいかにしてNetflixにとって大失敗となったのか？
item.description:
John Carreyrou / New York Times:
How Carl Rinsch's sci-fi TV series became a costly fiasco for Netflix, which burned $55M+ without receiving a single episode, an example of streaming excess  —  After suitors flocked to a sci-fi project by Carl Rinsch, director of a single movie, the winner handed over money and control.

item.title: メディア運動家によると、ジャーナリストの携帯電話のハッキングを阻止し、報道の独立性を保証するための欧州メディア自由法の提案は希薄になっている（Lisa O'Carroll/The Guardian）
item.description:
Lisa O'Carroll / The Guardian:
Media campaigners say proposals in the European Media Freedom Act to stop the hacking of journalists' phones and guarantee press independence have been diluted  —  Fears proposals on hacking journalists' phones and press independence in European Media Freedom Act have been diluted

item.title: 出典ジェフ・ザッカーによるテレグラフの構想には、アメリカ進出の可能性も含まれている。
item.description:
Michael M. Grynbaum / New York Times:
Source: Jeff Zucker's vision for The Telegraph includes a potential expansion into the US, where he believes a market has emerged for a center-right news outlet  —  The veteran TV executive is poised to take control of two prominent British news outlets, The Daily Telegraph and The Spectator, and may expand them into America.

item.title: 出典英文化相がアブダビの支援を受けたグループによるテレグラフ・グループ買収の調査を準備する中、レッドバードIMIはガバナンスの変更を計画（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
Source: RedBird IMI plans governance changes as the UK culture minister prepares an investigation of the Telegraph Group's buyout by the Abu Dhabi-backed group  —  Redbird IMI plans to offer further assurances to ensure independence of the newspaper  —  UK culture minister Lucy Frazer …

item.title: ProPublicaの組合は、ProPublicaがパートナーシップを通じて記事を提供することで、Post-Gazetteの経営陣がストライキに耐えるのを助けていると訴えている（Will Sommer/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Will Sommer / Washington Post:
ProPublica's union complains that ProPublica is helping the Post-Gazette's management endure a strike by supplying the outlet with stories via its partnership  —  The media nonprofit's union wants to stop a collaboration with a newspaper whose reporters are on strike.

item.title: 英国人女性ニコラ・ブルリーさんの失踪事件に関する警察の捜査に関する独立したレビューで、報告不可能な背景説明の使われ方に不備があったことが判明（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An independent review of a police investigation into UK woman Nicola Bulley's disappearance finds failings in how non-reportable background briefings were used  —  Review says non-reportable background briefings could have been used effectively.  —  The relationship between the media and police must be …

item.title: パラマウントやプライム・ビデオなどのスタジオやストリーマーに雇われ、映画のセットや舞台挨拶、レッドカーペットからTikToksを作る25歳のリース・フェルドマンのプロフィール（Kirsten Chuba/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Kirsten Chuba / The Hollywood Reporter:
A profile of 25-year-old Reece Feldman, hired by studios and streamers like Paramount and Prime Video to make TikToks from film sets, junkets, and red carpets  —  “People of my generation know when they're being advertised to, but they'll accept being advertised to if it's in their language …

item.title: ハースト新聞社チーフ・コマーシャル・オフィサーのブリジット・ウィリアムズ氏による、新人ガイドのようなコマースフレンドリーなコンテンツを使ったローカルニュースへの資金提供についての講演の要約（Brian Morrissey/The Rebooting）
item.description:
Brian Morrissey / The Rebooting:
A summary of a talk with Hearst Newspapers Chief Commercial Officer Bridget Williams on using commerce-friendly content like newcomers guides to fund local news  —  On this week's episode of The Rebooting Show, I spoke to Bridget Williams, chief commercial officer at Hearst Newspapers.

item.title: TikTokが資金提供したレポート：TikTokユーザーは、平均的な消費者よりも音楽ストリーマーにお金を払う可能性が高く、平均的なリスナーよりもコンサートにお金を使う（Stuart Dredge/Music Ally）
item.description:
Stuart Dredge / Music Ally:
TikTok-funded report: TikTok users are much likelier to pay for a music streamer than the average consumer and spend more on concerts than the average listener  —  - Click to email a link to a friend (Opens in new window)  —  TikTok has commissioned research firm Luminate for a new report analysing its impact on music.

item.title: メモユニビジョンCEOのウェイド・デイビスは、好意的すぎると非難された同局のトランプ・インタビューを擁護し、同局は「いかなる政党の道具でもない」と述べた（The Wrap）。
item.description:
The Wrap:
Memo: Univision CEO Wade Davis defends the network's Trump interview, which was panned for being too favorable, saying the network is “not a tool of any party”  —  The Congressional Hispanic Caucus responded to the Nov. 9 interview on Monday, saying they're “concerned” about Univision's mission
